tasks.title: Create iOS project scaffold and two-mode navigation
tasks.details: Set up the app shell with a horizontal swipe container for Capture and Chat plus a header showing mode and sync status.
steps: Create the Xcode project and app entry point
Implement a swipe container between Capture and Chat
Add a minimal header with mode label and sync status icon

tasks.title: Implement onboarding and permissions flow
tasks.details: Show a welcome screen, request camera (and optional photos) permissions, and handle denial paths.

tasks.title: Bootstrap the vault filesystem and base structure
tasks.details: Create the default vault folder tree, SYSTEM.md, INDEX.json, and STRUCTURE.txt with atomic file writes.

tasks.title: Define the local data model and persistence layer
tasks.details: Model Batch, Scan, Note, SyncState, Index, and Notebook entities using Core Data or SQLite with migrations.

tasks.title: Build the capture camera and scanning pipeline
tasks.details: Live camera preview with document detection, auto-crop, deskew, enhancement, and local image storage.

tasks.title: Add batch capture and inbox management UI
tasks.details: Create batch sessions, track scan status, show inbox count, and allow review/retry of failed items.

tasks.title: Implement processing queue and background tasks
tasks.details: Queue processing per notebook, schedule BGTaskScheduler jobs, and honor Wi-Fi/charging constraints.

tasks.title: Integrate the Gemini LLM client
tasks.details: Implement network client, auth configuration, retries/backoff, and response parsing.

tasks.title: Build transcription, structure, and classification pipeline
tasks.details: Support fast/balanced/best modes, validate JSON outputs, and preserve raw transcripts.

tasks.title: Implement vault writer and Markdown note generation
tasks.details: Write daily notes, store scan images and transcripts, and apply file operations atomically.

tasks.title: Create the indexer and local search store
tasks.details: Maintain INDEX.json and STRUCTURE.txt, plus a SQLite FTS index for fast retrieval.

tasks.title: Implement retrieval for chat grounding
tasks.details: Query index + FTS, expand via wiki-links, and build a context bundle for the chat agent.

tasks.title: Implement the chat agent and grounding rules
tasks.details: Call the LLM with context and system rules, enforce grounded responses, and return sources metadata.

tasks.title: Build the chat UI with sources disclosure
tasks.details: Chat bubbles, input bar, typing indicator, and collapsible used sources with open actions.

tasks.title: Add the Ask about this capture-to-chat flow
tasks.details: After finishing a batch, jump to chat and prioritize the latest batch context.

tasks.title: Create settings screens and basic toggles
tasks.details: Implement grouped settings for Processing, Sync, Organization, Privacy, and Advanced toggles.

tasks.title: Implement folder export as a sync destination
tasks.details: Allow selecting a folder destination and run background sync after processing or apply-to-vault.

tasks.title: Add sync status UI and error handling
tasks.details: Show sync status in the header, expose settings banners, and add retry flows.

tasks.title: Implement privacy and security baseline
tasks.details: Add LLM image send toggle with disclosure text and store tokens securely in Keychain.

tasks.title: Add system rules file management and editor
tasks.details: Maintain SYSTEM.md defaults and allow editing in Settings; apply rules in prompts.

tasks.title: Implement apply-to-vault workflow
tasks.details: Parse fileOps from chat, apply changes in a single transaction, and surface success/failure.

tasks.title: Add wiki-linking and entity page creation
tasks.details: Detect entities/projects, create pages lazily, and insert wiki-links in notes.

tasks.title: Implement task extraction and consolidation
tasks.details: Optionally aggregate tasks into 13_tasks and keep them updated during processing.

tasks.title: Add topic pages and optional Johnny.Decimal mode
tasks.details: Generate _topics pages and support strict numbering for folder names when enabled.

tasks.title: Implement GitHub destination sync
tasks.details: Add OAuth flow, repo selection, and background sync with retries.

tasks.title: Add advanced review and diff mode
tasks.details: Show file list and lightweight diffs before apply-to-vault when advanced review is enabled.

tasks.title: Support multiple notebooks
tasks.details: Implement notebook selection in capture, per-notebook rules, and overrides in data model.

tasks.title: Add vault export as ZIP
tasks.details: Provide a Settings action to export the vault as a ZIP via the share sheet.

tasks.title: Implement local encryption option
tasks.details: Encrypt vault data at rest if supported and manage keys securely.

tasks.title: Add performance instrumentation and targets
tasks.details: Measure capture latency, processing throughput, and chat retrieval timing to hit target budgets.

tasks.title: Create test coverage and QA plan
tasks.details: Add unit tests for pipeline logic, integration tests for vault/sync, and UI smoke tests.

tasks.title: Resolve open product decisions and defaults
tasks.details: Decide default sync behavior, transcript storage format, and multi-notebook timing; update defaults and copy.

tasks.title: Honor auto-process inbox toggle in processing scheduler
tasks.details: Gate enqueue/background processing on the auto-process setting and resume queued work when re-enabled.

tasks.title: Respect linking toggle for wiki-links and entity page creation
tasks.details: Disable link injection, entity page creation, and prompt instructions when linking is turned off.

tasks.title: Make processing failures retryable instead of permanent errors
tasks.details: If the Gemini API key is missing or a scan fails, keep batches queued/blocked and provide a retry action that requeues LLM processing.

tasks.title: Process scans in deterministic order within a batch
tasks.details: Sort batch scans by page number or capture time before processing so daily notes append in the right sequence.

tasks.title: Require network connectivity before LLM processing and background tasks
tasks.details: When auto-processing with Gemini, only run when any network is available (cellular or Wi-Fi). Set BGProcessingTaskRequest.requiresNetworkConnectivity = true and update hasRequiredNetwork to check general connectivity when Wi-Fi-only is off; reschedule instead of marking scans error when offline.

tasks.title: Make batch retry reprocess scans missing processed images
tasks.details: In Capture inbox retry, handle scans in error/preprocessing states without processedImagePath by rerunning DocumentProcessingPipeline from raw images (similar to retryScan) so batch retry can recover all failed scans.

tasks.title: Clean up decrypted temp copies opened from chat
tasks.details: When local encryption is enabled, opening a note from chat writes a decrypted copy under the temp marginshot-decrypted folder; add cleanup (on open completion or app launch) to avoid leaving plaintext files on disk.

tasks.title: Defer decrypted temp copy creation until user opens a source
tasks.details: Source rows currently call VaultFileStore.decryptedCopyURL during render, which writes plaintext temp files for every listed source. Only decrypt/write on Open tap and base the button enabled state on vault file existence.

tasks.title: Use proper form encoding for GitHub OAuth token exchange
tasks.details: GitHubAPI.exchangeCodeForToken builds an application/x-www-form-urlencoded body with urlQueryAllowed encoding. Switch to RFC 3986-compliant percent encoding so redirect_uri and verifier characters are safely encoded.

tasks.title: Refresh task consolidation after apply-to-vault updates
tasks.details: VaultApplyService updates index and topic pages but does not re-run TaskConsolidator; run refresh after apply so Tasks.md reflects chat-applied edits.

tasks.title: Preserve Gemini API key if Keychain migration fails
tasks.details: GeminiConfiguration.load removes GeminiAPIKey from UserDefaults even if Keychain save fails; only remove after a successful Keychain write and surface failure.

tasks.title: Prevent concurrent processing runs across background and foreground triggers
tasks.details: Ensure ProcessingQueue uses a single shared guard when invoked from BGTaskScheduler and foreground enqueue calls to avoid double-processing batches or racing state updates.

tasks.title: Mirror deletions in sync destinations
tasks.details: FolderSyncer and GitHubSyncer currently only upload/copy changed files; add deletion handling so removed vault files are deleted remotely (with safeguards against non-vault files).

tasks.title: Define disable-encryption behavior and rebuild search index
tasks.details: When local encryption is turned off, either decrypt the vault or warn that files remain encrypted; ensure FTS search is rebuilt when encryption is disabled so retrieval returns full-text results.

tasks.title: Reset GitHub sync baseline when repository selection changes
tasks.details: Selecting a new repo/branch keeps githubLastSyncAt from the prior repo, which can skip the initial upload. Clear or scope the last sync timestamp per repo/branch when the selection changes.

tasks.title: Avoid sync errors when offline by gating GitHub sync on network availability
tasks.details: Before GitHub sync, check for any network (or Wi-Fi if required). When offline, skip the sync attempt and keep status idle rather than marking an error.

tasks.title: Handle open batches left after app restarts
tasks.details: Open batches with pending scans stay stuck and never reach processing if the app is closed before Finish. Detect open batches on launch or in Inbox and provide a way to queue or resume them.

tasks.title: Make VaultSyncIntegrationTests independent of user defaults
tasks.details: Set organization style/encryption defaults in test setup and read vault files via VaultFileStore (or force encryption off) so tests do not fail when preferences change.

tasks.title: Reset Vision detection state when rectangle detection fails
tasks.details: CameraController.captureOutput sets isDetecting true before running VNImageRequestHandler. If the Vision request fails, the completion handler is never called and isDetecting stays true, which stops document outline updates. Ensure the flag is cleared on failure and consider clearing the overlay or reporting the error.

tasks.title: Avoid decrypted temp file name collisions for different vault paths
tasks.details: VaultFileStore.decryptedCopyURL uses a sanitized filename derived from the relative path. Different paths can sanitize to the same name (for example, foo/bar.md and foo_bar.md), which can overwrite decrypted files and open the wrong content. Include a path hash or preserve directory components in the temp filename to keep decrypted copies unique.

tasks.title: Avoid auto-queueing open batches when auto-process is disabled
tasks.details: enqueueOpenBatches currently marks open batches queued on launch, which prevents resume and leaves batches stuck when auto-process is off. Only auto-queue when auto-process is enabled, or preserve open status and surface resume/queue actions.

tasks.title: Provide real app icon assets for AppIcon set
tasks.details: Assets catalog lists sizes but has no filenames; add PNGs for required iPhone/iPad sizes including 1024 marketing.

tasks.title: Supply GitHub OAuth client ID/redirect URI via build config
tasks.details: GitHubClientID in Info.plist is empty, so GitHub sign-in always fails. Inject client ID/redirect URI from xcconfig or environment and document setup.

tasks.title: Ensure camera session configuration always commits
tasks.details: CameraController.configureSession calls beginConfiguration but can throw before commitConfiguration, leaving the session in a configuring state. Use defer or explicit error handling to always commit before returning. Verified the current implementation already uses defer to commit the configuration, so no code changes were required.

tasks.title: Report background processing deferrals as successful
tasks.details: ProcessingQueue.processPendingBatches already treats power/network deferrals as successful by rescheduling and returning true, so BGTaskScheduler avoids failure backoff; no code changes required.

tasks.title: Add batch mode toggle to Capture UI
tasks.details: The Capture UI shows Batch: On but there is no toggle to disable batching. Add a batch mode switch so users can auto-finish after each scan when batch mode is off. Verified CaptureView already includes a batch mode toggle and auto-finish; no code changes required.

tasks.title: Derive BGTask identifier from bundle ID
tasks.details: BGTaskSchedulerPermittedIdentifiers and ProcessingQueue.taskIdentifier are hard-coded to com.example.MarginShot.processing. Use $(PRODUCT_BUNDLE_IDENTIFIER) or Bundle.main.bundleIdentifier to keep the identifier consistent when the bundle ID changes.

tasks.title: Add ApplyReviewView.swift to Xcode target sources
tasks.details: ChatView references ApplyReviewSheet, but ApplyReviewView.swift is not listed in project.pbxproj. Add the file to the MarginShot target sources so the app compiles. Verified that ApplyReviewView.swift is already present in project.pbxproj (lines 15, 66, 179, 339) - the file reference exists, is in the Views group, and is included in the Sources build phase. No changes were needed.

tasks.title: Exclude local search index files from sync destinations
tasks.details: Folder/GitHub sync currently includes _system/search.sqlite (+ wal/shm), which is derived and churns on every update. Skip these files when building sync manifests/copy lists to reduce upload size and noise. Verified FolderSyncer and GitHubSyncer already exclude _system/search.sqlite, _system/search.sqlite-wal, and _system/search.sqlite-shm; no code changes were required.

tasks.title: Validate sync configuration and clear stale errors on destination changes
tasks.details: SyncStatusStore.refreshDestination only sets the destination, so switching from GitHub to Folder (or launching with missing tokens/repo/folder) can leave stale error/idle states. Centralize validation to set or clear sync errors based on current destination and config so the header reflects reality without opening Settings.

tasks.title: Prune auto-generated topic pages when tags are removed
tasks.details: TopicPageStore.refreshIfEnabled only creates/updates topic pages. Remove auto-marked topic files that are no longer in the generated tag set while preserving user-authored pages.

tasks.title: Reset batch status when processing is cancelled
tasks.details: If background processing is cancelled (for example BGTaskScheduler expiration), processBatch returns early without updating the batch status, leaving it stuck in processing with no retry path. Ensure cancellation restores batch status (queued or blocked) and scan states so the inbox can retry.

tasks.title: Handle ASWebAuthenticationSession start failures in GitHub OAuth
tasks.details: GitHubOAuthSession.requestAuthorizationCode does not handle ASWebAuthenticationSession.start() returning false, which can leave the continuation unresolved and the UI stuck on Connecting. Return a GitHubOAuthError when start fails.

Implemented by deferring batch queueing until preprocessing completes. The batch status is now only set to queued after all preprocessing finishes, preventing the processing queue from starting before processed images are available.
tasks.title: Prevent retryBatch preprocessing from racing processing queue
Reschedule background processing tasks when constraints change
tasks.details: ProcessingQueue.scheduleBackgroundProcessing returns early if a pending request exists, so updated Wi-Fi or charging settings do not update BGProcessingTaskRequest constraints. Cancel and resubmit when processing preferences change.

tasks.title: Queue the correct batch after retry preprocessing
tasks.details: Implemented by capturing the retried batch id before async preprocessing work and using that identifier to fetch and queue the correct batch when preprocessing completes. The fix prevents queueing the wrong batch when retrying an old batch while capturing a new one.

tasks.title: Revalidate sync status after clearing GitHub repository selection
tasks.details: Implemented by calling syncStatus.validateConfiguration() after clearing GitHub repository values in clearGitHubRepoSelection(). This ensures the sync status immediately reflects the missing repository error in the header when the repository is cleared.

tasks.title: Cancel pending background processing requests when auto-process or image uploads are disabled
tasks.details: Auto-process inbox and Send images to LLM toggles currently stop enqueuing new work but leave any scheduled BGProcessingTaskRequest in place. Cancel pending requests when these toggles are turned off to avoid unnecessary background wake-ups.
